title: Friend cannot reset password after account becomes inaccessible (Associated e-mail no longer exists)
body: My friend has a level 30 account where they suddenly had no access to it due to an invalid passowrd, except they hadn't changed the password at all. No activity has been on this account since this incident, and many requests for changing e-mails with the account as well as password changes have had no reply within 4 days. They've along with friends have tried gaining access back to the account with no avail and would really love the matter resolved!

replies.body: We'll only recover an account belonging to the owner, and we don't support sharing so his friends will need to stop trying to gain access.  Sorry to be blunt, but a lot of compromise cases are a result of sharing circumstances!  Have your friend reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll help him if we can!  Thanks for helping out your friend!
